lead_paragraph: Danica Patrick became the first female winner in IndyCar racing Sunday, taking the Indy Japan 300 in Motegi, Japan, after the top contenders were forced to pit for fuel in the final laps.
snippet: Danica Patrick became the first female winner in IndyCar racing Sunday, taking the Indy Japan 300 in Motegi, Japan, after the top contenders were forced to pit for fuel in the final laps.
